title: I Was Permabanned because my little brother snuck on my account and raged
body:
Hello Everybody, 
          
         Today I have come back after a 6 month break from league due to a very intense academics career at the UF. As I login to my account I am absolutely shocked to see that i have been permabanned due to negative chat logs. I am a very passive guy and i have not touched the game in 6 months, so Immediately begin to think it is a mistake. I then read the chat long and notice that the spelling and grammar is abusive and rather childish. I first am convinced it was hacked and could not believe it happened until i begin to tell my little brother what happened. Mid way through my story he begins to cry and apologize for getting my account banned. The 6 months i have been gone for school he apparently figure out my password and got various bans and then finally a permabanned. I could not believe what i was hearing and i was so upset, but i am honestly just banking on the League community for support. He told me that he has sent repeated emails in attempt to recover the account before i came home. Clearly, this is partially my fault for letting my password be seen and therefore i should be punished. However i have had this account for years and the amount of champions, and skins i have attained over the years would takes years to acquire. I know there are no Riot Employees on this but maybe if we can get enough views and comments we may get lucky. Please help me out, I am begging. If you don,t want to help me out becasue you don,t know me, help me out because I'm gator;D  \

replies.body:
We've seen *soooo* many people type this exact same story that it's long since been written off as a terribly unoriginal deception to try and get accounts back at this point.

* "I was away at college, and it was a tough semester where I didn't play a single game"
* "My little brother was on the computer I use to play on"
* "My little brother guessed my password"
* "My little brother just happens to be one of the most vile pieces of crap to ever type on the internet. How was I to know he wouldn't follow my calm, polite, example?"

This is between you and your "brother" at this point. Teach him responsibility for his actions. You can go privacy.riotgames.com to look up how much you've spent on your account, make him pay you back for at least the money.

He made a previous thread litterally a few mins before this one saying how he was sorry and how he'd never do it again, typing the exact same tone and phrases as this one.

It's even funnier that he tried to do this knowing he failed litterally like 15 mins before.

Account security is pretty important, and if two-factor authentication were on the table, I'd advocate hard for it.
